titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the dollar limitation on the deduction of interest on education loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the current dollar limitation on the deduction for interest on educational loans. Modifies the dollar amounts used in calculating the modified adjusted gross income limitation on the deduction for interest on educational loans.
